description: Converts the case of text values of a datatable column.

input.name: column
input.description: The name of a column in data to be converted.

input.name: case
input.description:
One of the following supported case patterns:
- `no`
- `dot`
- `swap`
- `path`
- `upper`
- `lower`
- `camel`
- `snake`
- `title`
- `param`
- `kebab`
- `hyphen`
- `header`
- `pascal`
- `constant`
- `sentence`
- `upperfirst`
- `lowerfirst`

input.name: target
input.description:
The name of the column to which converted values are added.
If unspecified, it defaults to the value of `column`.

output.name: data
output.description: A new datatable with target column added.
